titles.title: Authorizing the Speaker to administer the oath of office.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
1/7/2015--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes the Speaker of the House of Representatives to administer the oath of office to Representative-elect Alan Nunnelee at Tupelo, Mississippi.
